entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
